name: City Highway Racing Cars: No L
name_original: City Highway Racing Cars: No L
description:
City Highway Racing Cars: No Limit is very challenging but with easy controls. Just break the limits on roads with speedy cars and extreme high speed.

features:
- High-quality car models
- Detailed environment with changing day and night
- Uncompromising rivals with AI elements
- Lively traffic and relentless police
- Various game modes
